sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Smart TVs, speakers, and voice assistants often collect behavioral and usage data and send it back to manufacturers without your knowledge.
Most home routers ship with weak security settings, default passwords, and open ports that can be exploited by malware or exposed to the internet.
IoT devices often bypass traditional firewall settings and communicate directly with cloud services, creating hidden risks on your network.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We build hardened home networks using principles from NIST and CISA guidance, tailored for residential environments. Our service includes all the essentials to reduce digital risk and improve control:
items: DNS filtering to block malware, tracking, and phishing domains
Wi-Fi hardening with strong encryption and restricted access
Isolated guest networks for visitors and untrusted devices
Custom firewall rules to block unwanted or unknown traffic
Segmentation to separate vulnerable smart devices from your main network
Hands-on setup without cloud dashboards or unnecessary subscriptions

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We begin by evaluating your home network, identifying weak points and insecure defaults.
Then we apply practical, open-source solutions that give you better privacy and fewer vulnerabilities without adding complexity.
You stay in control and informed throughout the process. No black boxes. No ongoing fees.
